summary: This document is a criminal history record summary from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services, likely for Jeffrey Epstein or an associate, showing an arrest date of February 4 (year unspecified) and noting the identification is not based on fingerprint comparison.

persons.name: Michael C. Green
persons.role: Executive Deputy Commissioner of the NYS Division of Criminal Justice Services
persons.context: He is listed as the executive deputy commissioner of the agency issuing the criminal history record.

events.title: Sentencing rule change
events.description: Sentencing rule established where sentences for multiple charges within a docket are considered concurrent unless specified as consecutive.

events.title: Arrest
events.description: An arrest occurred on February 4 (year inferred as 2008 based on Epstein's known arrest timeline, though year is not explicitly stated in document).

locations: New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services Alfred E. Smith Building, 80 South Swan St. Albany, New York 12210
keyFacts: The document is a criminal history record summary from the New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services.
It shows an arrest date of February 4 (year not fully specified, but likely 2008 for Epstein).
The identification is noted as not being based on fingerprint comparison.
The subject has information maintained by other states or in multiple NYS files maintained by the FBI through the Interstate Identification Index.
The document includes a warning about unauthorized release of information being prohibited by federal law (Title 42 USC 3789g(b)).
